author: eptwts
text:
plans are definitely needed, but not enough people truly understand that the path becomes clearer as you walk it...

nothing i have ever planned unfolded exactly the way i envisioned it

yes these plans turned into successful projects, but the difference between the "plan" & the finished product is always much different

ideas automatically adapt to the obstacles / insights that come up as you start summoning them into reality & it's pretty hard to account for all these things in your mind as you're planning - it's best to tackle them as they come & get that experience under your belt

in other words, the best way to figure out the best way of doing something... is to do it, lol
